pycopancore.util package¶

Submodules¶

pycopancore.util.functions module¶

pycopancore.util.functions.ITE(cond, iftrue, iffalse)[source]¶

returns iftrue when condition is True, else iffalse

pycopancore.util.functions.safe_div(a, b, i=inf, z=0)[source]¶

division extended to divisor zero

returns a/b if b!=0, i (default:inf) if b=0<a, -i if b=0>a, and z (default:0) if b=0=a

pycopancore.util.functions.safe_log(x, i=-inf)[source]¶

log extended to all real numbers

returns i (default: -inf) for x <= 0

pycopancore.util.functions.safe_pow(x, e, i=inf)[source]¶

modified power function defined for all x and e

returns the sign of x times the abs of x raised to the power e, returns i (default:inf) if x == 0 > e

pycopancore.util.functions.safe_sqrt(x)[source]¶

square root extended to negative values

returns the sign times the sqrt of the abs
